title: Just got reported for not Accepting a Friend Request, now i know that Reporting is Broken.
body:
Playing some bots on my Smurf and some randy lvl 1 sent me a friend request which i declined so they reported me. 
I laughed when a pop-up came up saying i was done for Harassment: Offensive Language.
Funny thing is that i only typed during the beginning of the game and once to tell the Ashe on our team to turn on Q when shes chasing Low Enemies.
Even funnier was that the only thing i said in the beginning was, and i quote:
>hmmm im not sure if Kassidin is a Soup or a Man
>im going to lock in C eddie,
> Soup
(Cause the Kass's Name was "Soup or Man". Not even Name or Shame thats just what he was called.)

...and then when i was typing something after, i was going to say something that contained "shit" in the sentence, then i proactively thought, no, if i do that someone is going to report me because its beginner bots and everyone here has yet to experience the real LoL Community, so i didnt say anything.
 And before anyone says, "Oh but u must of said something offensive and your just not telling us", no, i proactively avoided that potential outcome with the specific purpose of not getting reported

Low and Behold, reporting is broken. Enjoy your Year.

0/10 Mads
http://imgur.com/X38Pwwv

EDIT: Lol i got a Helpful out of that game too.

seriously, i could do a social experiment on this. since i shot call in all my games. if i started talking to people the way you do, i would probably be banned after 5 games.
also, its bots. the people playing are either low skill/level or want FWOTD. they dont want to be berated by other people doing the same thing, or just outright trolls playing bots because they are too %%%% to be playing real games. if you want to troll, go to troll central, ARAM. there is no reason to abuse people who are just trying to learn or have a quiet one.
